overview: This was made as part of the 2014 48 hour film project In Cape Town. 48 hours to script, shoot and edit a short film.  Winner of 10 awards including "Best Film"  These were the mandatory requirements.  Genre given: Western (include elements of the genre) Prop: Envelope Character to Include: Neil Msimang Line of dialogue: "You gona learn"
title: Five Minutes Till Noon
